Flag_meaning: Suspect observation (i.e. buoy reports wind during day with known proximity issue)
Out of range for station official data temporal record (i.e. buoy reports data past disestablishment date)
Elevation manually infilled for buoy out-of-range of DEM (check if not buoy)
Value outside of world record range
Cross-variable logic check failure: dewpoint temperature exceeds air temperature
Cross-variable logic check failure: wind direction is not zero when wind speed is zero
Cross-variable logic check failure: accumulated precipitation value is too large upon comparison to other accumulated periods
Cross-variable logic check failure: accumulated precipitation value is too small upon comparison to other accumulated periods
Cross-variable logic check failure: accumulated precipitation in a 24h period is too low compared to accumulated precipitation since local midnight
